The State of Lead Nurturing

From the Agency Marketer's Perspective

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_hidden-sm vc_col-xs-12 vc_hidden-xs”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row content_placement=”top” css=”.vc_custom_1525275406838{padding-top: 2% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1525275661232{margin-top: 0px !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 20px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Leads. They’re like the holy grail of sales and marketing.

Your clients want more of them and if you want to grow your agency you need more of your own. And what do you do with those coveted leads once you have them?

To find out how agencies are successfully nurturing leads through the customer journey, we partnered with Ascend2 to survey 107 marketing agency professionals.

In the resulting eBook, you’ll learn what’s working for agencies, and see how your agency’s lead nurturing efforts stack up.[/vc_column_text]

A little about SharpSpring:
[vc_column_text el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]If you’re not familiar with SharpSpring, we’re a revenue growth platform with a powerful suite of sales & marketing automation tools to help you boost conversions and deliver results.[/vc_column_text][vc_video link=”https://vimeo.com/360856486″ align=”center” css=”.vc_custom_1625237552774{margin-bottom: 50px !important;}”]
